name: Asteroid Must Die! 2
description:
Tutorial.

The main goal of the game is to destroy all 99 asteroids.

At first, buy a spaceship in the "Prestige" window.

Great, you have a spaceship! To move spaceships on the screen hold down the right mouse button on the spaceship and move it.

Now let's shoot! By single left-click on the spaceship it will shoot without cooldown. Fire 5 shots.

We're almost done. Now buy some upgrades from the "Upgrade" window.

Remember that prestige points can be obtained only after the destruction of the asteroid.

So if you cannot cope, you can return to the previous level. For this, use the panel at the bottom of the screen.
